mapper.select: select count(*) from item where category_no = #{category}

select * from (select rownum rnum, ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_BRAND, ITEM_ORIGIN, ITEM_IMAGE, ITEM_CONTENT, CATEGORY_NO, ITEM_PRICE_ORIGIN, ITEM_PRICE_SALES, ITEM_PRICE_DISCOUNT, ITEM_SALES_QUANTITY, ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_VIEW, ITEM_REGDATE, ITEM_UPDATE_DATE, OPTION_SIZE, ITEM_COLOR from (select * from ITEM
order by ITEM_NO desc
order by ITEM_SALES_QUANTITY desc
order by ITEM_PRICE_DISCOUNT asc
order by ITEM_PRICE_DISCOUNT desc
order by ITEM_SALES_QUANTITY desc
order by ITEM_STOCK desc
)) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}

select * from (select rownum rnum,ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_BRAND, ITEM_ORIGIN, ITEM_IMAGE, ITEM_CONTENT, CATEGORY_NO, ITEM_PRICE_ORIGIN, ITEM_PRICE_SALES, ITEM_PRICE_DISCOUNT, ITEM_SALES_QUANTITY, ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_VIEW, ITEM_REGDATE, ITEM_UPDATE_DATE, OPTION_SIZE, ITEM_COLOR from (SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_BRAND, ITEM_ORIGIN, ITEM_IMAGE, ITEM_CONTENT, CATEGORY_NO, ITEM_PRICE_ORIGIN, ITEM_PRICE_SALES, ITEM_PRICE_DISCOUNT, ITEM_SALES_QUANTITY, ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_VIEW, ITEM_REGDATE, ITEM_UPDATE_DATE, OPTION_SIZE, ITEM_COLOR FROM ITEM where CATEGORY_NO = #{category} order by ITEM_SALES_QUANTITY desc)) where rnum <=4
update item set item_view = item_view +1 where item_no = #{item_no}

select * from (select rownum rnum,ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_BRAND, ITEM_ORIGIN, ITEM_IMAGE, ITEM_CONTENT, CATEGORY_NO, ITEM_PRICE_ORIGIN, ITEM_PRICE_SALES, ITEM_PRICE_DISCOUNT, ITEM_SALES_QUANTITY, ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_VIEW, ITEM_REGDATE, ITEM_UPDATE_DATE, OPTION_SIZE, ITEM_COLOR from (SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_BRAND, ITEM_ORIGIN, ITEM_IMAGE, ITEM_CONTENT, CATEGORY_NO, ITEM_PRICE_ORIGIN, ITEM_PRICE_SALES, ITEM_PRICE_DISCOUNT, ITEM_SALES_QUANTITY, ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_VIEW, ITEM_REGDATE, ITEM_UPDATE_DATE, OPTION_SIZE, ITEM_COLOR FROM ITEM order by ITEM_SALES_QUANTITY desc)) where rnum <=8

select * from (select rownum rnum,ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_BRAND, ITEM_ORIGIN, ITEM_IMAGE, ITEM_CONTENT, CATEGORY_NO, ITEM_PRICE_ORIGIN, ITEM_PRICE_SALES, ITEM_PRICE_DISCOUNT, ITEM_SALES_QUANTITY, ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_VIEW, ITEM_REGDATE, ITEM_UPDATE_DATE, OPTION_SIZE, ITEM_COLOR from (SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_BRAND, ITEM_ORIGIN, ITEM_IMAGE, ITEM_CONTENT, CATEGORY_NO, ITEM_PRICE_ORIGIN, ITEM_PRICE_SALES, ITEM_PRICE_DISCOUNT, ITEM_SALES_QUANTITY, ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_VIEW, ITEM_REGDATE, ITEM_UPDATE_DATE, OPTION_SIZE, ITEM_COLOR FROM ITEM order by ITEM_NO desc)) where rnum <=3

update item set ITEM_NAME=#{name}, ITEM_BRAND=#{brand}, ITEM_ORIGIN=#{origin}, ITEM_IMAGE=#{main_img}, ITEM_CONTENT=#{content_img}, CATEGORY_NO=#{category}, ITEM_PRICE_ORIGIN=#{price_origin}, ITEM_PRICE_SALES=#{price_sales}, ITEM_PRICE_DISCOUNT=#{price_discount}, ITEM_STOCK=#{stock}, ITEM_UPDATE_DATE=sysdate, OPTION_SIZE=#{option_size}, ITEM_COLOR=#{color} where ITEM_NO = #{no}
